p:testcaseDefinition.p:name: EID_SERVER_A2_01_RSA
p:testcaseDefinition.p:description: Positive test verifying the eID-Server to supports the given signature algorithm and parameters for XML signatures during communication at the eID-Interface.
p:testcaseDefinition.p:clientExplanation: Configure the server to accept the certificate chain for client E. This includes the TLS, XML signature and the CV certificate.
